name: Summoner of Lightning
description:
During this Round, the Normal Attacks of the character to which this is attached will cost 1 less Unaligned Element.
Usage(s): 2
descriptionraw: During this Round, the Normal Attacks of the character to which this is attached will cost 1 less $[K309].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>
